title: Cannapedia
blurb: Open, structured encyclopedia of cannabis genetics, chemotypes, COAs, and agronomic dataâ€”queryable and verifiable.
description: Cannapedia ingests and normalizes signed COAs from licensed laboratories, links entries to cultivar lineage and synonyms, and models environmental variables (terroir, lighting, nutrients). It provides a graph/REST API for search, similarity (chemotype distance), and lineage traversal. Designed for research, breeding programs, retail education, and compliance workflows.
